main event: A civilian woman reported seeing two slow-moving objects in the sky over Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a 'weird glow' and appearing disc-shaped.
The objects came from the southeast, crossed the sky at an elevation of about 45 degrees, and then disappeared.
The sighting occurred between 10 and 11 PM Eastern Standard Time.
Another witness, an airman from the 97th Fighter-Interceptor Squadron, reported seeing a similar object east of his home in Dayton between midnight and 1 AM.
A third report described an object that appeared to be an unusually bright star with 'auxiliary' stars moving around it, observed south of the Dayton Municipal Golf Course.
sighted object: two disc-shaped objects, an unusually bright 'star' with auxiliary objects
